{"id":374394187,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 8 months","timestamp":1596277903,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/374394187/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Detect Capital","memory":"6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool detectCapitalUse(string word) {\n        if (word.length() == 0) {\n            return true; \n        }\n        bool only_first_uppercase = isupper(word[0]); \n        bool no_uppercase = !only_first_uppercase; \n        bool all_uppercase = only_first_uppercase; \n        \n        for (int i = 1; i < word.length(); ++i) {\n            if (isupper(word[i])) {\n                no_uppercase = false; \n                only_first_uppercase = false; \n            } else {\n                all_uppercase = false; \n            }\n            if (!(no_uppercase || all_uppercase || only_first_uppercase)) {\n                return false; \n            }\n        }\n        \n        return no_uppercase || all_uppercase || only_first_uppercase; \n         \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"detect-capital"}
